title: x/image/color/palette: Add support for CSS3 / SVG supported named colors
body:
[SVG][3] & [CSS3][2] [specify][1] named colors which are based on the original [X11 colors names][4] and are widely supported and used by web-browsers. Making them available palette package could be useful for web applications and also other image applications that want to make use of standard named colors.

We could provide in a sub-directory (eg. css3colors) under the palette package:
- named `Color` variables
- A `map[string]Color` to lookup textual representation
- A `[]Color` palette 

Happy to work on this if the direction sounds right..
 
[1]: http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-color/#svg-color
[2]: http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-color/#html4
[3]: http://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/types.html#ColorKeywords
[4]: http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-color/#X11COLORS
